full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA 'DI NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'O PHYIR, ,DE LAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI BA ZHES, ,AER TE NI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR, ,SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS BDE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYUD DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZE BAS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LA BZANG GI RKYEN DAN BAR CHAD @012A *, ,KUN BZLOG PA'I GA 'GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE BAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
